title: SPACIOUS 3 BED HOUSE W/ OFFICE - GARDEN
posting_body: ['Open house Sunday 08-07-2022 - 1:00 pm to 3:00 pm.', 'Currently tenants occupied.', 'Do not disturb.', 'This charming masterpiece of a single family home, steps away from Glen Park Bart and Tech Shuttle Stop, combines the perfect balance of commuting and working from home.', 'This 2 level house offers the benefits of an ideal location, ample living space, bright natural light in every room, and a detached cozy office/studio in the lush garden.', 'With 1700 ft of living space, it comes with 3 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, a large deck, olives, lemons and fig trees.', "Upstairs you will find the chef's kitchen with hardwood counter tops, energy efficient appliances (5 burner stove, microwave, Bosch Dishwasher, refrigerator), a dining nook, a large pantry, a living room, a bright master bedroom (with 2 closets) a bathroom with a tub, all with beautiful wooden floors and natural light.", 'The kitchen has a direct access to a large deck with a view, perfect for sunny outdoor meals and direct access to the garden.', "Downstairs, you'll find 2 large bedrooms with 1 bathroom, washer and dryer, as well as french doors opening to the garden.", 'This house is perfectly located in peaceful Mission Terrace, 1/4 mile from Glen Park Bart on south side of 280.', "It's just a minute from the freeways, Glen Park Bart and public transportation.", 'Minutes to the Mission District, Glen Park, Noe Valley, and downtown.', 'Home', '- 3 bedrooms', '- 2 full bathrooms', '- Formal living room', '- Updated eat in kitchen with dining nook, large pantry, hardwood counter tops, energy efficient appliances', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Large deck', '- Tons of sunlight', '- Beautiful wooden floors', '- Large master bedroom with 2 closets', '- Washer and Dryer', '- Large single car garage and ample storage space', '- Peaceful lush garden (50x35 feet) with olive, fig and lemon trees', '- Separate office/studio space fully wired for internet and natural light in the garden', '- Cable tv hookups', '- Ample street parking', '- Central heat', 'Details:', '- Minimum security deposit is equal to 1 mont rent', '- All utility services paid by tenant', '- Small pets negotiable', '- All utility services paid by tenant']
